doc:
Eric Stonestreet https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eric_Stonestreet 0 Eric Allen Stonestreet (born September 9, 1971) is an American actor and comedian. He is best known for portraying Cameron Tucker in the ABC mockumentary sitcom Modern Family, for which he received two Emmy Awards for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Comedy Series out of three nominations. Stonestreet first rose to prominence in a recurring role on CSI: Crime Scene Investigation. He has appeared in films and telefilms including; Bad Teacher (2011), Identity Thief (2013), The Loft (2013), and Confirmation (2016). He also provided the voice of Duke in The Secret Life of Pets (2016). Eric_Allen_Stonestreet ( born September_9_,_1971 ) is an_American_actor_and_comedian . He is_best_known for portraying Cameron_Tucker in the_ABC_mockumentary_sitcom_Modern_Family , for which he received two_Emmy_Awards for Outstanding_Supporting_Actor in a_Comedy_Series out of three_nominations . Stonestreet first rose to prominence in a_recurring_role on CSI : Crime_Scene_Investigation . He has_appeared in films_and_telefilms including ; Bad_Teacher_(_2011_)_,_Identity_Thief_(_2013_) , The_Loft_(_2013_) , and Confirmation_(_2016_) . He also provided the_voice of Duke in The_Secret_Life of Pets (_2016_) .
